name: Shades of Cookies
description:
This is Shades of cookies

This was made for the Nokia Jam #3

The theme was ON/OFF

This is a 2P cookie clickers game

thanks to my partner in crime for giving me stuff to work on and not make this exactly like cookie clickers

sadly there is no 1P mode

I did make music, but repl.it did not want to work with me so I just made it a different file, it isn't that good tbh with the restriction

good luck and have fun

oh and for the people that care about theme. One person cares about on cookies the other off or they are picking which light to work in is better

basically is your head canon works with the theme it's correct
